Name: Flip Tale
About the game: FlipTale is a 2D platformer role-playing puzzle game. On the way home after work, the leading character saw a streak of light and a little boy. Suddenly, he found that he had been in a different world and got an ability to 'flip' the world. The player has to interact with the world by the ability to 'flip', solve the puzzles, get more information of the world and finally find out the truth of the whole story.
